p.span: See Statistics Help for definitions of terms used.

span.span: Data derived from multiple sources or calculated by Yahoo Finance.
Shares outstanding is taken from the most recently filed quarterly or annual report and Market Cap is calculated using shares outstanding.
EBITDA is calculated by Capital IQ using methodology that may differ from that used by a company in its reporting.
